meanings.sent1: Nonreaders can enjoy audiobooks instead of reading.
meanings.sent2: Libraries offer programs to encourage nonreaders to develop a love for books.
meanings.sent3: The nonreaders at the library event were surprised by how fun reading can be.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of stories, nonreaders are like closed books waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: Teachers work hard to inspire nonreaders to explore the magic of books.

meanings.definition: A person who is unable to read.
meanings.sent1: The teacher helped the nonreaders in the class learn to read.
meanings.sent2: Nonreaders may struggle with understanding written instructions.
meanings.sent3: The nonreaders in the group laughed when they realized they all had trouble reading.
meanings.sent4: To nonreaders, words on a page can seem like a secret code waiting to be cracked.
meanings.sent5: Nonreaders can feel empowered when they finally unlock the world of reading.
